titleStmt.title: Spiritual songs being the marrow of Scripture in songs of praise to Almighty God from the Old and New Testament : with a hundred divine hymns on several occasions as now practised in several congregations in and about London : with a table of contents / by Benjamin Keach, author of the war with the devil.
titleStmt.author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
